title: Puzzle Night
description: Come hang out with us to kick off the semester! There will be the funny arithmetic sudokus, the 24 game, a bunch of logic puzzles, and possibly more, or you can just come and chat. Come help us kick off the year with some fun!

title: Putnam Problem Solving Session
description: We solve problems from past Putnam exams, and other difficult problems. Pizza and drinks will be provided. Hosted in collaboration with Professor Jared Weinstein.

title: REU Discussions and Advising
description: An REU is a research experience for undergraduates, usually he;d diromg the summer. Our club members Katherine and Ophelia will discuss their REU experiences this past summer, as well as giving advice for those interested in doing an REU.

title: Putnam Problem Solving Session
description: We solve problems from past Putnam exams, and other difficult problems. Pizza and drinks will be provided. Hosted in collaboration with Professor Jared Weinstein.
